availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Executive Journal, 1859-1862

body.p:
16
The Governor approved an account to W. A. Gale for $16.75/100 on work done for the State certified by the Librarian as correct
He commissioned the officers of the Enrolled Militia for Letcher county, duly elected.

>Nov 16
The Governor issued a requisition on Missouri for the apprehension of Jno R. R. Watkins charged with obtaining money under false pretenses
He respited for twelve months the following Judgments

row.cell: Mason Cir. Ct vs I Canghlen & Wife --
